articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Atletico Madrid have invited former striker Ruben Ayala to Tuesday night's UEFA Champions League clash, Ayala famously played against Celtic back in 1974. 
Ruben Ayala has been invited by the La Liga side to pay homage to his role in Atletico's 2-0 aggregate victory over Celtic in 1974, even though Ayala was sent off in the 0-0 first leg and missed the second due to suspension.
The post Atletico Madrid play up 1974 'shame' legacy again for second Celtic match appeared first on 67 Hail Hail.

articles.description:
Brendan Rodgers believes league officials can do more to assist teams facing potential fixture congestion. For instance, Celtic's Champions League group stage opponents, Atletico Madrid, have only one game scheduled on Friday against Las Palmas between next week's Group E tie. In comparison Celtic face St Mirren tonight at Celtic Park and Ross County away in Dingwall on Saturday ahead of next Tuesday's clash against Atletico.
